title.narrative: Recht auf Nahrung Advocacy-Förderung von Programmen der Zivilgesellschaft
Strengthening Rural Governance for the Right to adequate Food

description.narrative: Administrative, political and traditional duty beares in the project regions in the 4 countries deliver better on the right to adequate food, guided by the principles of participation, transparency and accountability, non-discrimination and rule of law.
